title: Remembrance of Things Past: Volume III - The Captive, The Fugitive, & Time Regained
description: From the French intellectual, novelist, essayist, and one of the greatest writers of the twentieth the third and final volume of his monumental achievement, including The Captive, The Fugitive, and Time Regained.Marcel Proust's masterpiece is one of the towering literary works of the twentieth century. Relating its narrator's experiences in Belle Epoque France as he grows up, falls in love, and lives through the First World War, it has mesmerized generations of readers with its profound reflections on art, time, and memory.
